sentence.text: Across the border , the Turkish army is continuing vigorous armed raids against Kurdish placements throughout south-eastern Turkey and is crossing the border and bombing Kurdish villages in Iraq .

Sometimes young cuckoos are too vigorous in their attempts to remove their nest mates and fall out of the nest themselves .
